#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<vector>
#include<stdio.h>
int main(){
    int n,q,p,i,j,x,y;
    vector<int> v(1,0);
    scanf("%d%d",&n,&q);
    vector<vector<int> > a(101,vector<int> (n+1,0));
    for(i=0;i<n;i++){
        scanf("%d",&p);
        v.push_back(p);
    }
    for(i=1;i<101;i++){
        for(j=1;j<=n;j++){
            //int p=v[j-1];
            if(i==v[j])
                a[i][j]=a[i][j-1]+1;
            else
                a[i][j]=a[i][j-1];
        }
    }
    while(q--){
        int c=0;
        scanf("%d%d",&x,&y);
        for(i=0;i<101;i++){
            if(a[i][y]-a[i][x-1]>0){
                c++;
            }
        }
        printf("%d\n",c);
    }
    return 0;
}
